item.title: [Scrap please]
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

Gooden:

Good luck gettin dragon gear as 2 people hoard them + camp there with rangers all day.

To bad the king black dragon is moved now and is in the Wilderness where it is near impossible to range them. also, if you get a decent item you might get pked and lose it aswell.

Having said this, all the higher monsters that have great drops- Black Dragons, Red Dragons, King Black Dragons, Black Demons have Been alterd to be less powerful so that Players Can have a better chance at killing them. Red Dragons are Very easy to kill and drops Thousands at a time along with rune wepons, BUT the Catch is they are in the Lava Maze where you may also get Killed!!

Stunninhigh:

Good luck with the server matt, To hell with the haters, And by the way KingPK is AWFUL.

Thanks sir, people all seem to like it and it is still 70x for the players that would like to try it out and jump aboard… there is also a smither that is Very close to 99 so then it will be on and Poppin!

item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote=“Tim Dog, post:32, topic:525383”]I play for a few days now and its fun mainly mature players and ppl help out a lot !!! gj matt.

kreator / hatebreed[/quote]
Yeah i like how mature the players are and surprisingly very helpful!!! Any new people that come on get hooked up from our generous players… The Server is growing more and more by the day I love how people are having fun. KBD is being moved to the wilderness Along withthe already Red drags, and fire Giants as suggested by the players in the CRazzy Dragon Lave maze

image hosting

The wilderness is P2P for the next 4-5 hours!!!

EDIT: we hit 20 players online…

July 31st we NOW have a 70x the normal Experince Rate EVENT going to get the economy and players levels quick and fast, Don’t Miss Out!!!
